title: Fededim.Extensions.Configuration.Protected: The Ultimate Integration between ASP.NET Configuration and Data Protection API
description: Fededim.Extensions.Configuration.Protected is an improved ConfigurationBuilder which allows partial or full encryption of configuration values stored inside any possible ConfigurationSource and fully integrated in the ASP.NET Core architecture using Data Protection API.

title: VC++: Convert Console Project to Non-Console
description: Make a console program not to show the console screen
